title: Kai'sa bug on TFT
body: So i just did a void, assassin comp on TFT, my Kai'sa had zero items at all. Though after she used her ulti, she would have 100% dodge chance. I was getting targeted by the entire team and Kai'sa took zero damage. Might need to look into that one!

replies.body: Yeah I have seen something similar on a stream where Nidalee jumped in to attack and took zero damage for the rest of the fight.
I just had a game where I played void assassins and my lvl 2 kaisa (with 3 items) would get timed out by a lvl 1 kaisa with no items because they would dodge every attack
